page.title: 18Tourism in Ripe
page.content: The village is suitable for holidays. Firstly the events in Ripe are interesting to visitors. Several cottages are rented to tourists and just living in peaceful surroundings is a holiday for town-dwellers. The shops, being in a small village, are quite a change from the town supermarket. Here no queuing for the priviledge of paying an astronomical amount of money for a car-load of goods. Every customer is served with patience. Opposite the shops the Lamb Inn is a quiet country pub where one can enjoy a pint of bitter and play darts, toad-in-the-hole or numerous other pub games. Home-cooked food is also served. Walking and cycling are also good relaxing activities and coach tours come out from Eastbourne.Riding and horse care are catered for at Church Farm Stud.
